<letter id="smd7968">
<recipient first="" last="" type="individual"/>
</p><p>
[ <a href='/results.php?city=new orleans' rel='city origin'>New Orleans</a> ], Sunday, <a rel="month origin" value="11">November</a> <a rel='day origin' value='22'>22d</a>. [<a href='/results.php?year=1863' rel="origin">1863</a>]
</p><p>
A report has just reached us that my poor dear Gibbes has been taken prisoner along with the rest of Hayes's brigade. 
</p><p>
</letter>
